settings.thickness_level_1: Our lightest wetsuit. 3.5mm chest and back panel, 2.5mm arms and legs.
settings.thickness_level_2: 4.5mm chest and back panel, 3.5mm arms and legs.
settings.thickness_level_3: Our warmest wetsuit. 6.5mm chest and back panel, 4.5mm arms and legs.
settings.flexibility_level_1: Flexibility across shoulders and upper body to aid paddling.
settings.flexibility_level_2: Flexibility across shoulders and upper body to aid paddling.
settings.flexibility_level_3: Flexibility across shoulders and upper body to aid paddling.
settings.water_temperature_level_1: 6mm lower back panelling for extra warmth. Designed for sea temperatures 7-12C
settings.water_temperature_level_2: 5mm lower back panelling for extra warmth. Designed for sea temperatures 11-15C.
settings.water_temperature_level_3: Higher internal pile across chest and back for greater heat retention. Designed for sea temperatures 14-18C.

settings.banner_text: Born for the sea. Built for adventure.
